To provide consumer education 3. To undertake women development schemes under socio economic programmes and to create awareness among the women of above their rights in the society. 4. Protecting children from their issues by the support of 1098 toll free number. 2560 HRGs have been protecting from the sexual diseases under HIV prevention program. These are the major Activities and Achievements.

ngoList.title: Icha Foundation
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Registered Trust Deed in 2010  Icha Foundation adopted 5 mentally and physically challenged orphan and abandoned kids  Established a campus of 1 acres in village kondakurla around 54 kms from Visakhapatnam. Funds were raised from family and well-wishers and friends.  Shifted the Foundation to the Campus and added one more specially abled child from the nearby village of Kondakurla.  Built and established rapport with the Village and community and leaders in village Kondakurla  Got Foreign Contribution Regulation Act (FCRA)  Installed Solar Power Renewable for the Total Campus needs  Built and established a Physiotherapy Centre with a running facility and in-house Physiotherapist working full time for Icha Foundation for all the kids  Facilities like speech therapy introduced in 2014  Built and expanded the staff and children of the Icha Foundation within 5 years from 3 to 15 mentally and physically challenged orphan kids.  Severe Physical destruction of the campus during Hud-Hud and funds were raised for repair and rework.  Nearby donation of 1 acre land by Spanish sponsor in 2015 for establishment of a school with integrated rural children and children with severe disability.  Focus on building self-sustaining campus with investment in cows and livestock for food and milk requirement.  Awareness and medical camps two being organised in 2015 and 2016 in which nearby villages rural communities and children came around 700. This was a joint collaboration between Icha Foundation and Indian Navy  Fund raising event organised in Visakhapatnam in collaboration with razzmatazz event management company  Present donors are Feel Well garments, Flash Forge, Affiliation with kind from NAWA and Indian Navy.
